title: Item set not working across computers!!
body:
I am having issues with my item set whereas it works on my laptop and not on my pc. I recently started using PC to play however my item sets did not get transferred over. It still shows up on my profile > Item Sets however does not when a game starts.


HOW TO FIX THIS?!! PLEASE HELP

replies.body: It sounds like your files aren't syncing with the game server.  Have you recently made any modifications to your game files?  You may need to download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and refresh your client to cleanup any bad game files.  I hope that helps!
